name: Seamus Yikang Du
body:
### Welcome to Yikang's Personal Page 欢迎来到杜逸康的个人主页
I'm currently working as a data analyst in GISUNI/Esri China in Beijing, China,focusing on data analyzing, data products, and modeling. Personally, I'm really interested in LBS related products.

我目前是一名数据分析师，就职于北京捷泰天域信息技术有限公司，专注于数据分析，数据产品及数据算法模型。我本人对于提供基于位置信息的产品与服务特别的感兴趣。

### Work Experience 工作经历
* Data Analyst, GISUNI/Esri China 2015.10-Present

  Work on data products, such as fine census data products, census block data products, customized basemap.

  数据分析师，北京捷泰天域信息技术有限公司 2015.10-至今

  负责数据产品工作，例如细颗粒度的人口数据，街区数据，自定义底图等。

### Academic Experience 教育经历
* Master of Arts,Geography, University of Waterloo, Canada 2014.9-2015.8

  文学硕士，地理学，滑铁卢大学，加拿大 2014.9-2015.8

***

* Bachelor of Environmental Studies,Honors Geomatics,Computer Science minor, University of Waterloo, Canada 2012.9-2014.4

  环境研究学学士，荣誉测绘学，计算机科学辅修，滑铁卢大学，加拿大 2012.9-2014.4

***

* Bachelor of Science, Geographic Information System, China University of Geosciences (Beijing), China 2010.9-2012.7

  理学学士，地理信息系统，中国地质大学（北京），中国 2010.9-2012.7

***


### Publications 发表文献
**Du, Y.**, & Law, J. (2016). How Do Vegetation Density and Transportation Network Density Affect Crime across an Urban Central-Peripheral Gradient? A Case Study in Kitchener—Waterloo, Ontario. ISPRS International Journal of Geo-Information, 5(7), 118.

Tan, W., Liao, R., **Du, Y.**, Lu, J., & Li, J. (2015, July). Improving urban impervious surface classification by combining Landsat and PolSAR images: A case study in Kitchener-Waterloo, Ontario, Canada. In 2015 IEEE International Geoscience and Remote Sensing Symposium (IGARSS) (pp. 1917-1920). IEEE.

### Contact Me! 联系我
[contact me](yikangdu@outlook.com)
